Title: File Uploader++
Description: File uploader plus plus intentend to provide extended functionalities. The features are Ajax Uploding, Puse and Resume, Resumable even after an intentional or unintentional restart. It is developed using C#, Javascript and Silverlight technology..
HomeWiki:
What is it all about
File uploader plus plus intentend to provide extended functionalities. The features are
  • Ajax Uploding
  • Puse and Resume
  • Resumable even after an intentional or unintentional restart.
  • Resumable in case of disconnection
  • Secure file upload using random password protected encryption
It is developed using C#, Javascript and Silverlight technology

Project Status
The Alpha version is available to download now. You can download it by clicking on the link below
